basics.name: Gyueun Kim
basics.label: Software Enginner/Architect @Concentrix
basics.summary:
"Solving problems through the tool of development"
Passionate about automation, structuring, and refactoring to improve recurring tasks and inefficient processes.
summaryLong: I approach software development as a powerful tool for solving real-world problems, which has driven me to become versatile across multiple technology stacks and business domains.

With a track record of delivering under pressure—including launching complete services in just 8 weeks and automating deployment and API documentation processes—I consistently find efficient paths to valuable solutions.

I thrive in collaborative environments where team alignment is prioritized, and I actively contribute to creating spaces where open, honest communication drives our collective problem-solving efforts.

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: Grand(1st) Prize
awards.summary: 1st place (Grand Prize) in the Product and Service Development category at the Public Big Data Utilization Competition. Check out the project page for more details.
